title: ORGANVM — Eight-Organ Creative-Institutional System
tagline: A living system of 8 organs coordinating theory, art, commerce, orchestration, public process, community, marketing, and governance.

organs.name: Theory
organs.description: Epistemological frameworks, recursive engines, ontological systems, conceptual research

organs.name: Art
organs.description: Generative art, interactive systems, performance frameworks, experiential work

organs.name: Commerce
organs.description: Product platforms, deployed systems, customer-facing tools, B2B/B2C applications

organs.name: Orchestration
organs.description: Cross-organ routing, governance, promotion automation, system coordination, dependency management

organs.name: Public Process
organs.description: Essays, marginalia, process documentation, building in public, RSS/newsletter, audience engagement

organs.name: Community
organs.description: Community infrastructure, member management, governance, forums, shared resources, collaborative spaces

organs.name: Marketing
organs.description: Content distribution, social amplification, audience building, POSSE automation, release coordination, press/announcement strategy

organs.name: META-ORGANVM
organs.description: Umbrella organization coordinating all 7 organ orgs. System-wide governance, cross-organ visibility, and institutional identity.
